AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG: [p]tweets to see commands. Requires peony-twitter[all]. Do [p]tweetset to find commands for setting consumer key and secret and access token and secret. If you need these, visit https://apps.twitter.com/ and create an application. This plugin only needs read only permissions as it will only read public information
NAME: Tweets
SHORT: Cog for getting info from Twitter
DESCRIPTION: Gets public information from Twitter's api
